text: Wesley 'Wes' Mason (born 1941), is a male former cyclist who competed for England. ==Cycling career== He represented England and won a gold medal in the road race at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. He was a professional rider from 1965 until 1971. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:English male cyclists Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in cycling Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England Category:Cyclists at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Wes Mason (cyclist)
